title: Moderate a Product Review
description: A new product review has been submitted and is waiting for moderation before it appears on the website.

tasks.expected_outcome: An agent sees the list of pending reviews.

tasks.description: Read the review to ensure it does not contain inappropriate language or personal information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms the review complies with site policies.
The review is now visible on the product's page on the website.
